content: संस्था {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To dwell or live in, stand close together; तीक्ष्य दुद्विजते मृदौ परिभवत्रासान्न संतिष्ठते <ls>Mu. 3. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To stand on. {@--3@} To be, exist, live. {@--4@} To abide by, obey, act up to; दारिद्यात्पुरुषस्य बांधवजनो वाक्ये न संत्तिष्ठते <ls>Mk. 1. 36.</ls> {@--5@} To be completed; सद्यः संतिष्ठते यतस्तयाशौवमिति स्थितिः <ls>Ms. 5. 98</ls> (= यज्ञपुण्येन युज्यते <ls>Kull.</ls>). {@--6@} To come to an end, be interrupted; <ls>Bk. 8. 11.</ls> {@--7@} To stand still, come to a stand, (Paras.); क्षणं न संतिष्ठति जीवलोकः क्षयोदयाभ्यां परिवर्तमानः <ls>Hariv.</ls> {@--8@} To die, perish. {@--9@} To agree, conform to. {@--10@} To stand firmly. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To establish, settle. {@--2@} To place. {@--3@} To compose, collect (oneself). {@--4@} To subject, keep under control, <ls>Ms. 9. 2.</ls> {@--5@} To stop, restrain. {@--6@} To kill.

संस्था {@--1@} An assemblage, assembly. {@--2@} Situation, state or condition of being. {@--3@} Form, nature; <ls>R. 11. 38.</ls> {@--4@} Occupation, business, settled mode of life; पृथक्संस्थाश्च निर्ममे <ls>Ms. 1. 21.</ls> {@--5@} Correct or proper conduct. {@--6@} End, completion. {@--7@} Stop, stay. {@--8@} Loss, destruction. {@--9@} Destruction of the world. {@--10@} Resemblance. {@--11@} A royal decree or ordinance. {@--12@} A form of Soma sacrifice. {@--13@} Death, dying. {@--14@} Manifestation, appearance.
